author: keithrozario
content:
Hi Anne,

What you need to do is connect your laptop to the router via a Lan/Ehternet Cable. Then follow the steps below to logon into your router:
http://www.keithrozario.com/2013/08/hack-unifi-default-password.html
Option 3 always works :)

Finally follow the steps in this post:
http://www.keithrozario.com/2012/07/change-unifi-password-wifi-dlink.html
